Sure, here's the modified runbook in a tabular format:

| Section | Steps | Duties |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Introduction | Provide overview of runbook and goals | Team lead: establish team and plan |
| Preparation | Establish incident response team and plan | Team lead: establish team and plan |
| Preparation | Train team members and ensure access to necessary tools | IT Security Manager: ensure training and access |
| Preparation | Perform regular vulnerability assessments and penetration testing | - |
| Identification | Collect information on authentication attempt | Analysts: collect and analyze information |
| Identification | Use threat intelligence platform to check IP address for malicious activity | IT Security Manager: ensure access to necessary tools |
| Identification | Check authentication server logs for successful authentication attempts from low cost VPN providers | Analysts: review authentication server logs |
| Identification | Determine if user account has elevated privileges or access to sensitive data | - |
| Containment | Identify VPN service used by IP address | Analysts: identify VPN service used |
| Containment | Check VPN service for history of malicious activity | IT Security Manager: ensure access to necessary tools |
| Containment | Review VPN service logs for other suspicious activities | - |
| Containment | Add IP address to blacklist if VPN service associated with malicious activity | - |
| Eradication | Check endpoint used for authentication attempt for signs of compromise | Analysts: check endpoint for signs of compromise |
| Eradication | Ensure endpoint has up-to-date antivirus software and firewall enabled | IT Security Manager: ensure endpoints have necessary software and settings |
| Eradication | Check endpoint system logs for unusual activity | - |
| Eradication | Isolate and perform full malware scan if endpoint is compromised | - |
| Recovery | Change password associated with user account used in authentication attempt | Analysts: change password |
| Recovery | Alert affected users or departments of potential breach | Analysts: alert users or departments |
| Recovery | Document investigation and response in security incident report | - |
| Recovery | Use incident report to improve security protocols | IT Security Manager: use incident report to improve security |
| Lessons Learned | Review incident response process for areas of improvement | - |
| Lessons Learned | Conduct debrief with incident response team | Team lead: conduct debrief |
